sqlMap.select: SELECT DC.VIOLT_CD, DC.VIOLT_NM, DC.VIOLT_DC, LEVEL AS VIOLT_DP, DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD, FN_VIOLT_NM(DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD) AS VIOLT_UPPER_NM, DC.USE_YN, DC.SORT_ORDR, 0 AS LOWER_CNT FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD DC WHERE DC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DC.VIOLT_CD != '00000' AND DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD IN ( SELECT VC.VIOLT_CD FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD VC WHERE VC.USE_YN = 'Y' ) START WITH DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD = #start_cd# CONNECT BY PRIOR DC.VIOLT_CD = DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD /* 2021.08.02 coded by dgkim 죄명 가나다 순서로 재정렬 김지만 수사관 요청 */ ORDER SIBLINGS BY DC.SORT_ORDR ASC, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(DC.VIOLT_NM, 0, INSTR(DC.VIOLT_NM, '조')), '[^0-9]')) ASC, DC.VIOLT_CD ASC --ORDER SIBLINGS BY DC.SORT_ORDR ASC, DC.VIOLT_CD ASC

SELECT DC.VIOLT_CD, DC.VIOLT_NM, DC.VIOLT_DC, DC.VIOLT_DP, DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD, FN_VIOLT_NM(DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD) AS VIOLT_UPPER_NM, DC.USE_YN, DC.SORT_ORDR, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD S1 WHERE DC.VIOLT_CD = S1.VIOLT_UPPER_CD) AS LOWER_CNT FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD DC WHERE DC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DC.VIOLT_CD != '00000'
DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD = #violt_upper_cd#
DC.VIOLT_CD IN
#violt_cd_arr[]#
DC.VIOLT_CD NOT IN
#violt_cd_not_arr[]#
ORDER BY DC.SORT_ORDR ASC, DC.VIOLT_CD ASC

SELECT DC.VIOLT_CD, DC.VIOLT_NM, DC.VIOLT_DC, DC.VIOLT_CN, DC.VIOLT_DP, DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD, FN_VIOLT_NM(DC.VIOLT_UPPER_CD) AS VIOLT_UPPER_NM, DC.USE_YN, DC.SORT_ORDR, DC.WRITNG_ID, TO_CHAR(DC.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD S1 WHERE DC.VIOLT_CD = S1.VIOLT_UPPER_CD) AS LOWER_CNT FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD DC WHERE DC.VIOLT_CD = #violt_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMN_VIOLT_CD ( VIOLT_CD, VIOLT_NM, VIOLT_DC, VIOLT_CN, VIOLT_DP, VIOLT_UPPER_CD, USE_YN, SORT_ORDR, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DT ) VALUES( #violt_cd#, #violt_nm#, #violt_dc#, #violt_cn:CLOB#, (SELECT VIOLT_DP+1 FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD WHERE VIOLT_CD = #violt_upper_cd#), #violt_upper_cd#, 'Y', #sort_ordr#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE CMN_VIOLT_CD SET VIOLT_NM = #violt_nm#, VIOLT_DC = #violt_dc#, VIOLT_CN = #violt_cn:CLOB#,
USE_YN = #use_yn#,
SORT_ORDR = #sort_ordr#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE VIOLT_CD = #violt_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMN_VIOLT_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND VIOLT_UPPER_CD = #violt_cd#
